    • create

      public static Grid create​(java.lang.String fileName) throws java.io.IOException
      Create the list of blocks with the file name given in parameter, if the file name not exist : send exception to the main.
      Parameters:
      fileName -
      Returns:
      the new grid create
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • hasYou

      public boolean hasYou()
      Check if a Noun in all the block of blocks with the Property YOU exist in the grid
      Returns:
      true if the Noun exist or false if not

    • render

      public void render​(java.awt.Graphics2D graphics2D, int width, int height)
      Renders the Grid with all the objects in it.
      Parameters:
      graphics2D - Instance of Graphics2D object used to draw shapes on the screen.
      width - of the screen use to draw the shapes
      height - of the screen use to draw the shapes
